title: [Cerebro-oculo-muscular syndrome].
summary: Relationships to other similar but not identical syndromes are discussed....
abstract: The case of a newborn with COMS is reported. The patient presented hydrocephalus, malformations of the eye and congenital myopathy. Typical pathological changes are interpreted as belonging to type II lissencephaly. Relationships to other similar but not identical syndromes are discussed.
